I'm very thankful that you're going through all the effort to upload these.  I have one question though, is there anyway to increase the volume level?

My current MP3 player setup (PSP and SONY MDR-XD200 DJ Headphones) puts out great sound.  With most songs and podcasts, I can keep the volume level between 50 and 70% without issue, but these recording I need to crank it to 100% and even then I have to struggle to hear what's being said if there is any ambient noise in my vicinity (road traffic, public transit being the main issue).

If there's no way to increase this on the encoding side, does anyone know how to increase the volume in some kind of post processing program?

jjmk I experience the same volume issue. If you want a free editing program download http://audacity.sourceforge.net/ and follow the guide here to increase the volume http://www.tothetech.com/blog/software/how-to-increase-volume-of-mp3-using-audacity.html

Well, I could not upload yesterdays show here. One of the founding members of the pirate bay has died and the rest of them have decided to hang it up. So good luck to everyone. I have no idea how long the site will still be up, but I don't think anyone can post anymore. I am on Kick Ass Torrents, so you can follow me to there. I am also on Demonoid, but the registration is closed. Invitations are available, but who ever gives out the Invites is semi-responsible for those people whom they have invited and their  actions. I am sorry, but I don't really know anyone of you enough to vouch for you. Thank you WCDMXNAS for getting Ron & Fez out, I was just covering for MotherGoose56 while she was on Vaca. I am also going to take requests for a new site to post on. Let me know what sites you think would be good, and I'll choose one probably next week sometime.
Well... Its been an adventure... I'll see ya all out there.
The Pirate Bay is dead... Long Live the Pirates!!!!!!!
